    Cellosaurus Querying PubChem with AnnotationGx

    Build a query for the PubChem REST API

    dot-build_pubchem_rest_query.Rd

    This function builds a query for the PubChem REST API based on the provided parameters.

    Usage

    .build_pubchem_rest_query(
  id,
  domain = "compound",
  namespace = "name",
  operation = "cids",
  output = "JSON",
  url = "https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/rest/pug",
  raw = FALSE,
  query_only = FALSE,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    id

    The identifier(s) for the query. If namespace is 'name', id must be a single value.

    domain

    The domain of the query. Options are 'compound', 'substance', 'assay', 'cell', 'gene', 'protein'.

    namespace

    The namespace of the query. Options depend on the chosen domain.

    operation

    The operation to perform. Options depend on the chosen domain and namespace.

    output

    The desired output format. Options are 'JSON', 'XML', 'SDF', 'TXT', 'CSV'.

    url

    The base URL for the PubChem REST API.

    raw

    Logical indicating whether to return the raw response or parse it.

    query_only

    Logical indicating whether to return the query URL only.

    ...

    Additional arguments to be passed to the query.

    Value

    The query URL or the parsed response, depending on the arguments.
